trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateSelectButton%2A> property to enable the automatic selection feature of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateSelectButton%2A>屬性來啟用的自動選取功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display in the background of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項背景之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image to display in the background of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項背景的影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BackImageUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to an image to display in the background of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BackImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示的背景影像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the specified image is smaller than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the image is tiled to fill in the background.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的映像小於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，影像會並排顯示以在背景填滿。

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the control, the image is cropped.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像大於此控制項，則會裁剪影像。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BackImageUrl%2A> property to display a custom image in the background of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BackImageUrl%2A>屬性，在背景中顯示的自訂映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the bottom pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 物件，其表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的底端頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the bottom pager row in the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示控制項中的底端頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，允許使用者瀏覽至其他頁面，並可顯示在頂端、 底端，或最上層及控制項的底部。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件，表示內的底部頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項建立內的底部頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式管理下方的頁面巡覽區列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A>後必須執行屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項將會覆寫任何變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property to access the bottom pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性來存取內的底部頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property is used to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control from the pager row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性用來擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>頁面巡覽區列控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項之 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A>屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供具有可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的資料表描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the position at which to render the HTML caption element by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定用於轉譯 HTML 標題項目使用的位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> property to specify the caption for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A>屬性，以指定的標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中 HTML 標題項目的水平或垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" />, which uses the browser's default setting.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" />，它使用瀏覽器的預設設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的水平或垂直位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表底端對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the left side of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表左邊對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element's alignment is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定標題項目對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the right side of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表的右邊對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表的頂端對齊。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`, the default value of the browser is used.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`，會使用瀏覽器的預設值。

trans-unit.source: To specify the text for the HTML caption element, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定 HTML caption 元素的文字，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify that the caption element for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is aligned with the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性以指定的標題項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項與控制項的頂端對齊。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CellPadding%2A> property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CellPadding%2A>屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: All cells in the same column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項具有相同的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column have this cell width.
trans-unit.target: 填補數量會套用到最寬的資料格和資料行中的所有其他資料格都有這個儲存格的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row have this cell height.
trans-unit.target: 填補數量會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有其他資料格都有這個儲存格的高度。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CellPadding%2A> property to declaratively set the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CellPadding%2A>屬性來以宣告方式設定儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的空間數量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格之間的間距數量，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CellSpacing%2A> property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性，即可控制中的相鄰資料格之間的間距<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: The cell spacing is uniform for the entire control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格間距是一致的整個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell spacing between rows or columns cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定個別資料格的資料列或資料行之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value greater than 0 and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A> property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定此屬性的值大於 0，然後將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A>屬性相鄰的資料格的框線之間顯示儲存格框線的值，顯示間隔。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.CellSpacing%2A> property controls the size of the gap.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.CellSpacing%2A>屬性控制的差距大小。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CellSpacing%2A> property to declaratively set the amount of space between the cells of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性來以宣告方式設定儲存格之間的空間數量<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the names of the data fields whose values are appended to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> property value to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料欄位的名稱，這些值會附加至 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 屬性，以便識別資料繫結控制項的每一個唯一的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The names of the data fields whose values are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 資料欄位的名稱，其值會在 ASP.NET 產生 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值時，用來識別資料繫結控制項的每個唯一的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered in multiple rows of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, ASP.NET generates a unique <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value for each instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免命名衝突，當控制項的多個執行個體以多個資料列的轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，ASP.NET 產生唯一<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>每個執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: You specify how the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value is generated by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您指定如何<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>藉由設定產生值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>, ASP.NET will generate the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> by appending a suffix that is derived from the data field or fields that are specified in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>，ASP.NET 會產生<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>藉由附加的尾碼，衍生自所指定的資料欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A> is not set, the suffix is a sequential number.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A>未設定，尾碼是一組序號。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料值，這些值會在 ASP.NET 產生 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值時，用來識別資料繫結控制項的每個唯一的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 資料值，這些值會在 ASP.NET 產生 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值時，用來識別資料繫結控制項的每個唯一的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> objects that represent the column fields in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 物件的集合，其表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料行欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> that contains all the column fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的所有資料行欄位。

trans-unit.source: A column field represents a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料行欄位表示中的資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> property (collection) is used to store all the explicitly declared column fields that get rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>屬性 （集合） 用來儲存明確宣告的資料行之所有欄位，以取得轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection to programmatically manage the collection of column fields.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>以程式設計方式管理的資料行的欄位集合的集合。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly declared column fields can be used in combination with automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: 明確宣告資料行欄位可用於與自動產生的資料行欄位搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: 同時使用時，明確宣告資料行欄位會首先呈現，後面接著的自動產生的資料行欄位。

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated column fields are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的資料行欄位不會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The column fields are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the order that the column fields appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料行欄位會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>順序的資料行欄位會出現在控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different column field classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> class and can be used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示不同的資料行欄位的類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>類別，並可用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Column field type
trans-unit.target: 資料行欄位類型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Displays the value of a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: 顯示資料來源中的欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設資料行類型的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays a command button for each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示每個項目中的命令按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the Add or the Remove button.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立的資料行的自訂按鈕控制項，例如 [新增] 或 [移除] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Displays a check box for each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示每個項目中的核取方塊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This column field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料行的欄位型別通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Displays predefined command buttons to perform select, edit, or delete operations.
trans-unit.target: 顯示預先定義的命令按鈕可執行選取、 編輯或刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。

trans-unit.source: This column field type enables you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料行的欄位型別可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Displays an image for each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示針對每個項目影像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays user-defined content for each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: 顯示每個項目中的使用者定義內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，根據指定的範本。

trans-unit.source: This column field type enables you to create a custom column field.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料行的欄位型別可讓您建立自訂的資料行的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Although you can programmatically add column fields to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection, it is easier to list the column fields declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of each column field to show or hide each column field.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以程式設計方式加入至資料行欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合，會比較容易清單以宣告方式中的資料行欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，然後使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>顯示或隱藏每個資料行欄位的每個資料行欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>資料行欄位的屬性設定為`false`，資料行不會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項和資料行的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a column that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要看不到構成來回行程的資料行的資料，加入欄位名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合以宣告方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control that will automatically generate the columns for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項，這個控制項將自動針對使用 ASP.NET 動態資料功能的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項產生資料行。

trans-unit.source: The control that will automatically generate the columns for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.
trans-unit.target: 控制項，將自動針對使用 ASP.NET 動態資料功能的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項產生資料行。

trans-unit.source: In order to use ASP.NET Dynamic Data features in a page, you must add a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要在網頁中使用 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 功能，您必須新增<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>控制項加入網頁。

trans-unit.source: This enables ASP.NET Dynamic Data features for data-bound controls in a page, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 功能，資料繫結控制項在頁面中，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To enable an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to use Dynamic Data features, you must associate it with the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> control by calling the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager.RegisterControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method during the `Page_Init` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓個人<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項以使用動態資料功能，您必須使其與<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>藉由呼叫控制項<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager.RegisterControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法期間`Page_Init`事件。

trans-unit.source: This method automatically sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ColumnsGenerator%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會自動設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ColumnsGenerator%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties" /> that represents the properties of the automatically generated column field to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties" />，表示要建立的自動產生之資料行欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates an automatically generated column field.
trans-unit.target: 建立自動產生的資料行欄位。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField" /> that represents the automatically generated column field specified by the <paramref name="fieldProperties" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField" />，表示 <paramref name="fieldProperties" /> 參數指定之自動產生的資料行欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateAutoGeneratedColumn%2A> method is used to create an automatically generated column field when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateAutoGeneratedColumn%2A>方法用來建立自動產生的資料行欄位時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the automatically generated column field are specified through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties> object contained in the `fieldProperties` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的資料行欄位的內容透過指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties>中所含物件`fieldProperties`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that contains the data source for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the child controls are bound to data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 指示子控制項繫結至資料，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control using the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定資料來源建立用於呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的控制階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows created.
trans-unit.target: 建立的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateChildControls%2A> method is used to create the control hierarchy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateChildControls%2A>方法用來建立的控制項階層架構<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataSource" /> returns a null <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 會傳回 null <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="dataSource" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface and cannot return a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 介面，且無法傳回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="dataSource" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface and cannot perform data source paging.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，而 <paramref name="dataSource" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 介面且無法執行資料來源分頁。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="dataSource" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface and <paramref name="dataBinding" /> is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 介面，且 <paramref name="dataBinding" /> 設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child table.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的子資料表。

trans-unit.source: Always returns a new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> that represents the child table.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回表示子資料表的新 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateChildTable%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create a child table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateChildTable%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來建立子資料表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" />，表示資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the data source specified by the <c>dataSource</c> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用 <c>dataSource</c> 參數指定的資料來源，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of column fields used to build the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 建立用於建置控制階層架構的資料行欄位集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the fields used to build the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，包含用於建置控制階層架構的欄位。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, a bound column field is automatically created for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性設定為`true`，繫結資料行欄位會自動建立資料來源中的每個欄位。

trans-unit.source: Each bound column field is then displayed as a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the order that the fields appear in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 每個繫結資料行欄位然後會顯示為中的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>順序欄位出現在資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateColumns%2A> method is used to create the automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateColumns%2A>方法用來建立的自動產生的資料行欄位。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default style for the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，表示控制項的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateControlStyle%2A> method is used to create the default style for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法用來建立控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object that contains the arguments that get passed to the data source for processing.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 物件，其包含傳遞至資料來源用於處理的引數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> that contains the arguments that get passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" />，包含傳遞至資料來源的引數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that contains the arguments passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件，其中包含引數傳遞至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object contains the arguments for paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件包含分頁作業的引數。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> class, you can override this method to specify your own values that are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法，以指定您自己會傳遞至資料來源的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data source item to bind to the row.
trans-unit.target: 要繫結至資料列之資料來源項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a row in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> created using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定參數建立的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateRow%2A> method is used to create a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateRow%2A>方法用來建立資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically generates the rows needed to display the target data.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項自動產生顯示目標資料所需的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Binds the data source to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將資料來源繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind> method to bind data from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind>方法將資料繫結至資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會解析所有資料繫結運算式在使用中的範本中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A> method is called automatically if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control refers to a valid data source control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A>方法會自動呼叫，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制指的是有效的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: Instead of manually calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A> method, you can use model binding with your <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A> property to the name of a method that returns data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 而不是以手動方式呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A>方法，您可以使用模型繫結來搭配您<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A>屬性的傳回資料的方法名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is then automatically populated with the data that is returned from the select method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>接著會自動填入從選取的方法傳回的資料。

trans-unit.source: Model binding can simplify your code for working with data.
trans-unit.target: 模型繫結可簡化您的程式碼使用的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind> method to bind a data source to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind>繫結至資料來源方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定陣列，這個陣列包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中所顯示項目的主索引鍵欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中所顯示項目的主索引鍵欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性來指定欄位或欄位代表資料來源的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: You should only set this property to the field or fields that are required to uniquely identify each row; for example, the ID column if an integer value uniquely identifies each row.
trans-unit.target: 您只應設定此屬性來唯一識別每個資料列; 所需的欄位例如，如果整數值的唯一識別碼資料行識別每個資料列。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property in order for the automatic update and delete features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性自動更新和刪除功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>運作的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to specify the row to update or delete.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要更新或刪除的資料列，這些索引鍵欄位的值會傳遞至資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when updating or deleting a row, use the `Keys` property of either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要擷取的資料更新時，機碼值，或刪除資料列中，使用`Keys`屬性中的其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, `e.Keys[0]` holds the value of the first data key in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`e.Keys[0]`保存的值中的第一個資料索引鍵<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when a row is selected, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要選取一個資料列時，擷取資料的金鑰值，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection with the values from the specified field or fields, which provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each row.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項就會自動填入其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>提供便利的方式來存取每個資料列的主索引鍵欄位或指定的欄位的值集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores these key field values in the control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項儲存這些索引鍵欄位值中的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: If these values contain sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you enable view-state encryption by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些值會包含機密資訊，強烈建議您藉由設定啟用檢視狀態加密<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>屬性`ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`。

trans-unit.source: When you use automatically generated field columns (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control makes sure that the columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用自動產生欄位資料行 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性`true`)、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項可確保中指定的資料行對應到欄位或欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>資料行欄位的屬性設定為`false`，資料行不會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項和資料行的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a column that is not visible to be available to the client, add the field name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要看不到可供用戶端的資料行的資料，加入欄位名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property to specify the key field of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性來指定資料來源的索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the `DataKeyNames` attribute of the `GridView` element in markup specifies two key fields by using a comma to separate the names.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，`DataKeyNames`屬性`GridView`標記中的項目會指定兩個索引鍵欄位，使用逗號來分隔名稱。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, create a Web site that has the following:
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，建立具有下列網站：

trans-unit.source: A connection to the AdventureWorksLT sample database and a connection string that is named `AdventureWorksLTConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫和名為連接字串的連線`AdventureWorksLTConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to set up the AdventureWorksLT sample database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫的資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫 ASP.NET 開發](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。

trans-unit.source: A LINQ-to-SQL data context class that is named `AdventureWorksLTDataClassesDataContext`.
trans-unit.target: LINQ 到 SQL 資料內容類別，以名為`AdventureWorksLTDataClassesDataContext`。

trans-unit.source: The data context must have a class for the SalesOrderDetails table.
trans-unit.target: 資料內容必須 SalesOrderDetails 資料表的類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to create LINQ-to-SQL classes, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何建立 LINQ 到 SQL 類別資訊，請參閱[LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects that represent the data key value of each row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件的集合，其表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中每個資料列的資料索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> that contains the data key of each row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中每個資料列的資料索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項會自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>控制項中的每個資料列的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object contains the values of the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件包含的欄位中指定的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件接著會加入至控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>屬性，以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>特定資料列中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for the currently selected row.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>屬性，以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>目前選取的資料列的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>直接擷取目前選取的資料列的資料值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property to determine the data key value of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>屬性來判斷選取的資料列中的資料值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 為了刪除資料，取得或設定要呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會導致模型繫結來做為資料繫結方法。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 刪除資料來源中指定索引的資料錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DeleteRow%2A> method to programmatically delete the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DeleteRow%2A>方法來以程式設計方式從資料來源中刪除指定索引處的記錄。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to delete a record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常使用於您要刪除的記錄從外部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法也會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DeleteRow%2A> method to programmatically delete a record in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DeleteRow%2A>方法來以程式設計方式刪除中的記錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is not bound to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項未繫結至資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data source control that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to does not support delete operations, or there is no delete command defined for the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項所繫結至的資料來源控制項不支援刪除作業，或是沒有為資料來源定義刪除命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要編輯之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯的資料列之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示沒有任何資料列正在編輯。

trans-unit.source: The row index is zero-based (the first row is row zero).
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料列索引 （第一個資料列是資料列零）。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only in the following scenarios, which involve handlers for specific events:
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常使用只在下列案例中，其中包含特定的事件處理常式：

trans-unit.source: You want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to open in edit mode for a specific row the first time that the page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 您想要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項以開啟特定資料列的編輯模式中的頁面會顯示第一次。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class or of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>屬性中的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You want to know which row was edited after the row was updated.
trans-unit.target: 您想要知道哪一個資料列已在編輯過之後已更新的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can retrieve the row index from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，您可以擷取從資料列索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You are binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您要繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項至資料來源，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: In this case you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property after a postback or in handlers for events that are raised later than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control might not enter edit mode for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>屬性在回傳後或在引發的事件處理常式晚於<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項可能會不進入編輯模式，針對指定的資料列。

trans-unit.source: If you read the value of this property in other event handlers, the index is not guaranteed to reflect the row that is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果您讀取其他事件處理常式中的此屬性的值，索引不會保證以反映正在編輯的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To determine which row the user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink in before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode, you can retrieve the row index from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪個資料列的使用者已按一下**編輯**按鈕或中的超連結，然後再<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項進入編輯模式，您可以擷取從資料列索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from entering edit mode after a user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項進入編輯模式之後使用者已按一下,**編輯**按鈕或超連結，將<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>物件`true`中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property to determine which row was updated after it was edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個資料列已更新之後尚未編輯的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A message is displayed to indicate that the update was successful.
trans-unit.target: 您可以顯示的訊息指出已成功更新。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the row selected for editing in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中已選取用於編輯之資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the row being edited in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中正在編輯之資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制正在編輯中的資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 將屬性放在開頭標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest an `<EditRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀`<EditRowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A> property to define a custom style for the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A>屬性可定義正在編輯中的資料列的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the empty data row rendered when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項繫結至不包含任何資料錄的資料來源時所呈現之空白資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that enables you to set the appearance of the null row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，可讓您設定 null 資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the null row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的 null 資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The null row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄時，會顯示 null 的資料列。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 將屬性放在開頭標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest an `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀`<EmptyDataRowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property declaratively to specify a light blue background and a red font for the null row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性以宣告方式指定淺藍色背景和 null 資料列的紅色字型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定空白資料之使用者定義的內容，該資料列呈現於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項繫結至不包含任何資料錄的資料來源時。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含空白資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the empty data row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定空白資料列的自訂範本，先將`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，設定為空的資料列使用內建的 UI<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically access controls that you declare in an empty data template, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何以程式設計方式存取您宣告空的資料範本中的控制項的資訊，請參閱[如何： 存取伺服器控制項的 ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3)。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for the empty data row displayed when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何定義自訂的範本，空白資料列會顯示當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定空白資料列中顯示的文字，該資料列呈現於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項繫結至不包含任何資料錄的資料來源時。

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 要在空白資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>屬性來指定要顯示空的資料列中的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>屬性來指定要顯示空的資料列中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示驗證程式控制項是否要處理在插入或更新作業期間發生的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證程式控制項將處理插入或更新作業期間發生的例外狀況則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the selection of a row is based on index or on data-key values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是根據索引還是資料索引鍵值來選取資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row selection is based on data-key values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是根據資料索引鍵值選取資料列，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false` and a row is selected, the same row is selected when a new page is displayed even though the new page has different data in it.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`並選取資料列，即使新的頁面中有不同的資料，會顯示新的頁面時，系統會選取相同的資料列。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, when you display a page that has different data in it, no row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`，當您顯示一個頁面中，有不同的資料，會選取任何資料列。

trans-unit.source: If you then return to the page on which a row was selected, that row is still selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您再傳回至頁面選取一個資料列，該資料列已選取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side callbacks are used for sorting and paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出用戶端回呼是否用於排序和分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use client-side callbacks for sorting and paging operations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將用戶端回呼用於排序和分頁作業，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, when a sorting or paging operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control posts back to the server to perform the operation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，排序或分頁作業執行時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項回傳至伺服器執行的作業。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A> property is set to `true`, a service is called on the client to perform sorting and paging operations, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>屬性設定為`true`、 服務稱為 「 用戶端執行的排序和分頁作業，就不需要文章回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Not all browsers support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有瀏覽器都支援這項功能。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a browser supports this feature, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷瀏覽器是否支援這項功能，請使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: All columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection must support callbacks for this feature to work.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合必須支援這項功能運作的回呼。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合包含的資料行，不支援回呼，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>、<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A> property to enable client-side callbacks for sorting and paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>屬性來啟用用戶端回呼來排序和分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns" /> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns" /> 集合包含不支援回呼的資料行，例如 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> used to store the field values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />，用於儲存欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> from which to retrieve the field values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，從其擷取欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include read-only fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包括唯讀欄位，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the primary key field or fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包括主索引鍵欄位，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field declared within the specified row and stores them in the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取在指定資料列內宣告之每個欄位的值，並將它們儲存在指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ExtractRowValues%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ExtractRowValues%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>來擷取指定的資料列內宣告的每個欄位的值控制`row`參數。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the extracted values include read-only fields and key fields by using the `includeReadOnlyFields` and `includePrimaryKey` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定擷取的值使用是否包含唯讀欄位和索引鍵欄位`includeReadOnlyFields`和`includePrimaryKey`參數，分別。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own routine to retrieve the field values.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的常式，以擷取欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 物件，其表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的頁尾資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
