trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的頁尾資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>屬性以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件，代表頁尾資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項建立頁尾資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作頁尾資料列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>後必須執行屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項將會覆寫任何變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property to display the sort direction in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>屬性來顯示頁尾資料列中的排序方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中頁尾 (Footer) 資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中頁尾資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制頁尾資料列中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 將屬性放在開頭標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `FooterStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<FooterStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀`<FooterStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FooterStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> property to define a custom style for the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性可定義頁尾資料列中的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回以控制項為目標之回呼事件的結果。

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回呼的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>介面並使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>以非同步方式擷取資料和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A>方法來擷取的資料傳回至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 為其建立回呼指令碼的按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至回呼指令碼的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 為執行排序作業的按鈕建立回呼指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行排序作業之按鈕的回呼指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackScript%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackScript%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來建立執行排序作業的按鈕的回呼指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的格線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="GridLines.Both" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="GridLines.Both" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A> property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A>屬性來指定格線樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Style
trans-unit.target: 樣式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: No gridlines are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 不顯示格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays the horizontal gridlines only.
trans-unit.target: 顯示水平格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays the vertical gridlines only.
trans-unit.target: 顯示垂直格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.
trans-unit.target: 顯示水平及垂直格線。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A> property to hide the gridlines in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A>屬性隱藏在格線<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 物件，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的標頭資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的標頭資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>屬性以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件，表示中的標頭資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項建立中的標頭資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the header row, for example, when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作標頭資料列時，例如，當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>後必須執行屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項將會覆寫任何變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property to programmatically change the font color of the header row based on the sort direction.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>屬性以程式設計方式變更標頭資料列的字型色彩會根據排序方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項之標頭資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中標頭資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的標頭資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 將屬性放在開頭標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<HeaderStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀`<HeaderStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> property to define a custom style for the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性可定義中的標頭資料列的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面上 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的水平對齊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HorizontalAlign%2A> property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HorizontalAlign%2A>屬性，以指定的水平對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>頁面內控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的水平對齊樣式。

trans-unit.source: Alignment value
trans-unit.target: 對齊值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 水平對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>尚未設定控制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is left-aligned on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項是在頁面上靠左對齊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is centered on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項置於頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is right-aligned on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項是在頁面上靠右對齊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項對齊頁面的左、 右邊界。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HorizontalAlign%2A> property to align a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control on the right side of a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HorizontalAlign%2A>對齊屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>頁面右側的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the pager row to initialize.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示要初始化的頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns the pager row should span.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽列應跨越的資料行數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" />，表示資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 初始化啟用分頁功能時顯示的頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.InitializePager%2A> method is used to initialize the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.InitializePager%2A>方法用來初始化啟用分頁功能時顯示的頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the row to initialize.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示要初始化的資料列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> objects that represent the column fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 物件的陣列，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料行欄位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a row in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.InitializeRow%2A> method is used to initialize a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.InitializeRow%2A>方法用來初始化中的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the data type to test.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示要測試的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 決定指定的資料類型是否可以繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的資料類型可以繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料行則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.IsBindableType%2A> method is a helper method that is commonly used by control developers to programmatically determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.IsBindableType%2A>方法是 helper 方法，通常由控制項開發人員用來以程式設計方式判斷指定的資料類型是否可以繫結中的資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following data types can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control:
trans-unit.target: 下列資料類型可以繫結中的資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項：

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved control state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含控制項之已儲存的控制項狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control that need to be persisted, even when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 載入需要保存之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中屬性的狀態，即使 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to load the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來載入中的屬性狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項需要保存，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含控制項的已儲存檢視狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the Web server control is passed up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定 Web 伺服器控制項的事件是否要向上傳遞至網頁的使用者介面 (UI) 伺服器控制階層架構。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已取消，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to pass events from child controls to the page hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將事件從子控制項傳遞至頁面階層。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Rebinds the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control to its data after the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> 屬性變更後，將 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> 控制項重新繫結至其資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind the control to its data after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>後其資料的控制項重新繫結控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own routine to rebind the data.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的常式，以重新繫結。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method notifies a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法會通知<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>基礎資料來源已變更，而且控制項應重新繫結的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>資料來源檢視的屬性已經變更時呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: 當通知由這個方法時，Web 伺服器控制項都必須執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's View state has yet to be populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法時，無論它是子系或父這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnInit%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnInit%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕按下時，但之後，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as a custom paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如自訂分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕按下時前,，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanging%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanging%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: There is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging" /> 事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanging(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnPageIndexChanging(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the server control to perform any necessary pre-rendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event is raised when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>按一下資料列處於編輯模式下的 [取消] 按鈕時，會引發事件，但該資料列結束之前編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如停止取消作業，會讓資料列處於不良狀態，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how provide an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event.

trans-unit.source: When the Add button is clicked for a given row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the name of the selected customer is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 對於給定的資料列的 [新增] 按鈕按一下時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，所選客戶的名稱加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnRowCommand(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnRowCommand(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈現控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>必須建立在控制項中的每個資料列的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised when each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>就會引發事件時每個資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如加入到資料列的自訂內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnRowCreated%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how provide an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何提供的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: When a row is being created, its index is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control that is contained in the new row.
trans-unit.target: 當建立一個資料列時，它的索引會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>包含新的資料列中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to determine the index of the row when the user clicks the command button.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您判斷資料列的索引，當使用者按一下 [命令] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個資料列必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>資料資料列時，就會引發事件 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件) 中的資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，例如修改繫結的資料列，此事件發生時的值。

trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如目前選取的資料列，更新狀態標籤時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the selected row is persisted in the view state.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，選取的資料列會持續保留在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: So even after a sorting or a paging operation, only that row will be selected.
trans-unit.target: 即使在已排序或分頁作業，將會選取該資料列。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of pages required to display the records of the data source in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中顯示資料來源之資料錄所需要的頁數。

trans-unit.source: The number of pages in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的頁數。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A> property to determine the total number of pages required to display the records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A>屬性來判斷資料來源中顯示的記錄所需的分頁總數。

trans-unit.source: This value is calculated by dividing the total number of records in the data source by the number of records displayed in a page (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property) and rounding up.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會計算除以在頁面中顯示的記錄數目的資料來源中之記錄的總數 (依指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>屬性) 和向上捨入。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A> property to determine the total number of pages displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A>屬性來判斷中顯示總頁數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前顯示頁面的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 目前顯示頁面之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>屬性來判斷目前所顯示頁面的索引。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式變更顯示的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the currently displayed page in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>屬性來判斷目前顯示的頁面中的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property can be used to specify which page is displayed after the user selects a value from the pager row.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>屬性可以用來指定要顯示的頁面之後，使用者從頁面巡覽列中選取值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex" /> property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex" /> 屬性會設定為小於 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕按下時，但之後，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as a custom paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如自訂分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event to display the page number selected by the user from the pager row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>事件 以顯示頁面巡覽區列的使用者所選的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項處理分頁作業之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕按下時前,，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，並指出應該取消的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the paging operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消的分頁作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event to cancel the paging operation if the user attempts to navigate to another page when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>事件取消的分頁作業，如果使用者嘗試瀏覽至另一個頁面時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings" /> object that enables you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中頁面巡覽區按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings" /> that enables you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings" /> 的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中頁面巡覽區按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A> property to control the settings of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A>屬性，即可控制的設定中的頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽列會顯示啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，並且包含允許使用者在控制項中的不同頁面導覽控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`).
trans-unit.target: 將屬性放在開頭標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>物件 (例如， `PagerSettings-Mode`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<PagerSettings>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀`<PagerSettings>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.Mode`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerStyle.Mode`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列的顯示模式和自訂文字或影像的導覽控制項，通常包含一般設定。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A> property declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A>屬性以宣告方式。

trans-unit.source: It sets the font and background for the pager row to blue and light blue, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 它會設定為藍色，並分別淺藍色的字型和頁面巡覽區列的背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項之頁面巡覽區資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中頁面巡覽列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>屬性來控制頁面巡覽列中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽列會顯示啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，並且包含允許使用者在控制項中的不同頁面導覽控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 將屬性放在開頭標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `PagerStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<PagerStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀`<PagerStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> property declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>屬性以宣告方式。

trans-unit.source: It sets the font and background for the pager row to blue and light blue, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 它會設定為藍色，並分別淺藍色的字型和頁面巡覽區列的背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中頁面巡覽列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the custom content for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含頁面巡覽列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: A pager row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to true).
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制啟用分頁功能時 (當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性設定為 true)。

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列包含允許使用者瀏覽至控制項中的不同頁面的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用內建的頁面巡覽區的資料列的使用者介面 (UI)，您可以定義自己的 UI 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A> property is set, it overrides the built-in pager row UI.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A>屬性設定，它會覆寫內建的頁面巡覽列 UI。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `<PagerTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定頁面巡覽區列的自訂範本，先將`<PagerTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<PagerTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<PagerTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the pager row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制項目的出現的頁面巡覽列，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常，按鈕控制項就會加入至頁面巡覽區範本，進行分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>分頁作業使用的按鈕控制項時，控制項執行其`CommandName`按一下屬性設定為 「 頁面 」。

trans-unit.source: The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕的`CommandArgument`屬性會決定要執行的分頁作業的類型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the command argument values supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的命令引數值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: `CommandArgument` value
trans-unit.target: `CommandArgument` 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: "Next"
trans-unit.target: 「 下一步

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the next page.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽至下一頁。

trans-unit.source: "Prev"
trans-unit.target: 「 Prev"

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the previous page.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽至上一頁。

trans-unit.source: "First"
trans-unit.target: "First"

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the first page.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽至第一頁。

trans-unit.source: "Last"
trans-unit.target: 「 最後 」

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the last page.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽至最後一頁。

trans-unit.source: Integer value
trans-unit.target: 整數值

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽至指定的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom pager template that allows the user to navigate through a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立自訂的頁面巡覽區範本，可讓使用者瀏覽<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of records to display on a page in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項之頁面上顯示的資料錄數。

trans-unit.source: The number of records to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 在單一頁面上顯示的資料錄數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property to specify the number of records to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>屬性來指定要在單一頁面上顯示的記錄數目。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property to display 15 records at a time in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>屬性中一次顯示 15 記錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize" /> property is set to a value less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize" /> 屬性會設定為小於 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that contains the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 包含資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified data source to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的資料來源繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>指定的資料來源繫結至控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" /> method is sealed, you should override this method if you need to perform any additional tasks when binding data.
trans-unit.target: 因為<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" />方法密封格式，如果您需要執行任何額外的工作，資料繫結時，您應該覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Establishes the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制階層架構。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to establish the control hierarchy for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來建立的控制項階層架構<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至事件處理常式的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 方法中回呼處理常式的引數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來建立在回呼處理常式的引數<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The event argument from which to create a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: 從其建立所引發事件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> 的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Raises the appropriate events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 回傳至伺服器時引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的適當事件。

trans-unit.source: The page calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method when a postback event occurs that raises the appropriate events for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法發生回傳事件時，就會引發的適當事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫發生在頁面生命週期中載入和變更的通知完成後，但尚未發生之前。

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object for the events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: 已經實作這個方法，以建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>物件引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: 用來在用戶端的瀏覽器中呈現伺服器控制項內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，向用戶端瀏覽器呈現 Web 伺服器控制項內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Render%2A> method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Render%2A>方法用來呈現伺服器控制項內容，以使用指定的用戶端瀏覽器<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 按一下處於編輯模式之資料列的 [取消] 按鈕時發生 (但在資料列結束編輯模式之前)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event is raised when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>按一下資料列處於編輯模式下的 [取消] 按鈕時，會引發事件，但該資料列結束之前編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如停止取消作業，會讓資料列處於不良狀態，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消作業。

trans-unit.source: To stop the cancel operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止取消作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event to display a cancellation message when the user cancels the update operation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>使用者取消的更新作業時，顯示取消訊息的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event to cancel the update operation when the data source is set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>取消更新作業，當以程式設計方式設定資料來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button is clicked in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>中按下按鈕時，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Buttons within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項也可以叫用的某些內建控制項的功能。

trans-unit.source: To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這些作業之一，設定`CommandName`下表中的值的其中一個按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: `CommandName` value
trans-unit.target: `CommandName` 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: "Cancel"
trans-unit.target: [取消]

trans-unit.source: Cancels an edit operation and returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 取消編輯作業，並傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>唯讀模式的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> 事件。

trans-unit.source: "Delete"
trans-unit.target: "Delete"

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record.
trans-unit.target: 刪除現有的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Edit"
trans-unit.target: [編輯]

trans-unit.source: Puts the current record in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的記錄放入處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> 事件。

trans-unit.source: "Page"
trans-unit.target: 「 頁面 」

trans-unit.source: Performs a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: Sets the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: 設定`CommandArgument`"First"，"持續 」 按鈕、 下一步 」、 「 Prev"，或執行頁碼，以指定的分頁作業類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Select"
trans-unit.target: 「 選取 」

trans-unit.source: Selects the current record.
trans-unit.target: 選取目前的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Sort"
trans-unit.target: "Sort"

trans-unit.source: Sorts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Update"
trans-unit.target: 「 更新 」

trans-unit.source: Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 更新資料來源中目前的資料錄。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> events.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>按一下按鈕，在上表所列時，會引發事件，則建議您使用作業的資料表中列出的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷命令名稱並按之按鈕的命令引數。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the row that raised the event, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the event argument that is passed to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷引發該事件的資料列的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>傳遞給事件的事件引數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> class automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property with the appropriate index value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>類別會自動填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>具有適當的索引值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For other command buttons, you must manually set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property of the command button.
trans-unit.target: 其他的命令按鈕，您必須手動設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>命令按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> to `<%# Container.DataItemIndex %>` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has no paging enabled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>至`<%# Container.DataItemIndex %>`時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項有沒有分頁已啟用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882).
trans-unit.target: 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event to add the name of a customer from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control when a row's Add button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>要加入的客戶名稱事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控制按一下資料列的 [新增] 按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event to update the price of a product when a row's button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>按一下資料列的按鈕時，更新的產品價格的事件。

trans-unit.source: This example has the paging functionality enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to the appropriate row index.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有啟用分頁功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項和集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項至適當的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row is created in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料列時發生。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈現控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>必須建立在控制項中的每個資料列的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised when each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>就會引發事件時每個資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如加入到資料列的自訂內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the row being created.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您存取正在建立的資料列的屬性。
