trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取特定的儲存格的資料列中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷哪一個資料列型別 （標頭資料列、 資料列，等等） 建立使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event to store the index of the row being created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control contained in the row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件存放區中建立的資料列索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>資料列中包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to determine the index of the row that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control when the user clicked the button.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您判斷所包含之資料列索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制當使用者按一下按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data row is bound to data in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料列繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料時發生。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個資料列必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>資料資料列時，就會引發事件 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件) 中的資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，例如修改繫結的資料列，此事件發生時的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the row being bound.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您存取所要繫結的資料列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取特定的儲存格的資料列中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>中所含物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being bound by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷哪一個資料列型別 （標頭資料列、 資料列，等等） 使用繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882).
trans-unit.target: 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event to modify the value of a field in the data source before it is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>事件，以修改資料來源中欄位的值，它會顯示在之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項刪除資料列之後)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>按一下的資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕，但之後時，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項刪除資料列。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如檢查刪除作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event to check the result of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件，以檢查刪除作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: A message is displayed to indicate to the user whether the operation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 若要對使用者指出作業是否成功，會顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項刪除資料列之前)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>引發資料列的 [刪除] 按鈕按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項刪除資料列。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消刪除作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消刪除作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>集合，如有必要之前的值會傳遞至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event to cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>取消刪除作業的事件。

trans-unit.source: The page contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that displays a list of customer names and addresses from the AdventureWorksLT database.
trans-unit.target: 此頁面包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>顯示一份客戶姓名和地址中有提供 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the **Delete** link for a row, the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event checks the last name of the person displayed in the row that the user is trying to delete.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下**刪除**連結的資料列的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件會檢查使用者嘗試刪除資料列中顯示之人員的姓氏。

trans-unit.source: If the last name is "Beaver", the delete operation is canceled, and an error message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個名稱為"河狸 」，已取消刪除作業，並會顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: For any other name, the delete operation proceeds and the row is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他名稱，繼續進行刪除作業，並在刪除資料列。

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> object to find the row that the user is trying to delete.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>物件來尋找使用者嘗試刪除的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The example examines the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會檢查的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the value you want to compare to is a key value, you could examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要的值比對索引鍵的值，您可以檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合改為。

trans-unit.source: Rows are deleted from the CustomerAddress table instead of the Customer table in order to keep the example simple.
trans-unit.target: CustomerAddress 資料表，而不是 Customer 資料表中刪除資料列以保持簡單的範例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control shows the result of joining three tables: Customer, Address, and CustomerAddress.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項顯示的結果聯結三個資料表： 客戶、 位址和 CustomerAddress。

trans-unit.source: When a CustomerAddress row is deleted, the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> row disappears.
trans-unit.target: 當刪除資料列時，對應的 CustomerAddress<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>資料列就會消失。

trans-unit.source: Referential integrity constraints would make the code for an example that actually deletes rows from the Customer table more complex.
trans-unit.target: 參考完整性條件約束會使其中實際刪除資料列從 Customer 資料表中更複雜的範例程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to set up the AdventureWorksLT database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定與 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫 ASP.NET 開發](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料列的 [編輯] 按鈕時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項進入編輯模式之前)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event is raised when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>引發資料列的 [編輯] 按鈕按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項進入編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消編輯作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the edit operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消的編輯作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event to put a row in edit mode when the data source is set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>將一個資料列處於編輯模式時以程式設計方式設定資料來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event to cancel the editing operation if the user attempts to edit the record for a company in the United States.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>取消編輯作業，如果使用者嘗試在美國公司編輯記錄的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the column to use as the column header for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行的名稱，做為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的資料行行首。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column to use as the column header.
trans-unit.target: 做為資料行行首的資料行名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the header of a table can be associated with either a row or a column.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，可以與一個資料列或資料行相關聯的資料表標頭。

trans-unit.source: The direction is specified by setting the `scope` attribute of the `<th>` elements.
trans-unit.target: 設定來指定方向`scope`屬性`<th>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in header row that can be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項具有內建的標頭資料列，可以藉由設定顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally specify a header column (usually the first or last column in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) by setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇指定的標頭資料行 (通常是第一個或最後一個資料行中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項) 藉由設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, all cells in the column that corresponds to the specified field name are rendered as `<th scope="row">` elements.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時，對應至指定的欄位名稱的資料行中的所有資料格會轉譯為`<th scope="row">`項目。

trans-unit.source: Although the specified column is treated like a header, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> properties do not apply to the header column.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料行就會被視為標頭，雖然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>屬性不會套用至標頭資料行。

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the `<th>` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 預設呈現`<th>`保留項目，以水平方式轉譯為粗體和置中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Developers can override the behavior of the `<th>` element using a cascading style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以覆寫行為`<th>`項目使用階層式樣式表。

trans-unit.source: This property works only with bound fields.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只適用於繫結欄位。

trans-unit.source: It does not work with template fields.
trans-unit.target: 它不適用於範本欄位。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> property to display a header column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A>屬性來顯示中的標頭資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects that represent the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 物件的集合，其表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> that contains all the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的所有資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> property (collection) is used to store the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>屬性 （集合） 用來存放區中的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection by creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object for each record in the data source and then adding each object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項就會自動填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>藉由建立集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件資料來源中的每一筆記錄，然後將每個物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to access a specific row in the control or to iterate though the entire collection of rows.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於存取控制項中的特定資料列或逐一查看整個資料列的集合。

trans-unit.source: Only rows with their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property set to `DataControlRowType.DataRow` are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 只有當資料列具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>屬性設定為`DataControlRowType.DataRow`會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects that represent the header, footer, and pager rows are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>代表頁首、 頁尾和頁面巡覽區的資料列的物件不包含在集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection to access the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>存取正在編輯中的資料列集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: After a row is updated, a message is displayed to indicate that the update was successful.
trans-unit.target: 更新資料列之後，會顯示訊息，指出更新成功。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>屬性也設定時，資料列會顯示交替<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>設定和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 將屬性放在開頭標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `RowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<RowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀`<RowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> property to declaratively define the style for the item rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>來以宣告方式定義中的項目資料列的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料列的 [更新] 按鈕時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項更新資料列之後)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>按一下的資料列的 [更新] 按鈕，但之後時，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項更新資料列。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event to check the result of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>事件，以檢查更新作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: A message is displayed to indicate to the user whether the operation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 若要對使用者指出作業是否成功，會顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料列的 [更新] 按鈕時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項更新資料列之前)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>引發資料列的 [更新] 按鈕按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項更新資料列。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消更新作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您決定目前的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消更新作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消更新作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>集合，如有必要之前的值會傳遞至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些集合的常見方式是將 HTML 編碼再將它們儲存在資料來源中，使用者所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: This helps to prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於防止指令碼資料隱碼攻擊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections are automatically populated only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to data by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>集合會自動填入時才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項透過繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> event to update the values in the data source object when the data source is set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>事件，以程式設計方式設定資料來源時，更新資料來源物件中的值。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control that need to be persisted, even when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 儲存需要保存之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中屬性的狀態，即使 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回伺服器控制項的目前檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to save the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來儲存中的屬性狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項需要保存，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含控制項之已儲存的檢視狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object that contains the data key value for the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件，其包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中已選取資料列的資料索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> for the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 控制項中已選取資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that no row is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示目前未選取任何資料列。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項會自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>控制項使用的值或指定的欄位或欄位的值中的每個資料列的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件接著會加入至控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>屬性用來擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>特定資料列中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: However, if you just need to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您只需要擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件的目前選取的資料列，您可以直接使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>較快速的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object at the index specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這是擷取相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>所指定索引處物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>直接擷取目前選取的資料列的資料值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>物件，並想要存取的第一個欄位以外的索引鍵欄位，請使用索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>物件。

trans-unit.source: An example is shown below.
trans-unit.target: 範例如下所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property to determine the data key value of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>屬性來判斷選取的資料列中的資料值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the second key field as a parameter in a master/detail scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用第二個索引鍵欄位做的主要/詳細資料案例中的參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is used to display records from the Order Details table of the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項用來顯示訂單詳細資料資料表的 Northwind 資料庫中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: When a record is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the details of the product from the Products table are displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 記錄中選取了時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>從 Products 資料表之產品的詳細資料會顯示在控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: ProductID is the second key name in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: ProductID 是中的第二個索引鍵名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To access the second key, the value of GridView1.SelectedDataKey[1] is used as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的第二個索引鍵的 GridView1.SelectedDataKey[1 值] 做為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: No data keys are specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames" /> 屬性中未指定任何資料索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中已選取資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中已選取資料列之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示目前未選取任何資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the currently selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性來判斷在目前選取的資料列索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically select a row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式在控制項中選取一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: To clear the selection of a row, set this property to -1.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除選取的資料列，請將這個屬性設為-1。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the currently selected row can be customized by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用自訂目前選取的資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access the currently selected row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取目前選取的資料列，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to select the second row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the control is initially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性，以選取中的第二個資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制最初顯示在控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex" /> property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex" /> 屬性會設定為小於 -1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料列的 [選取] 按鈕時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項處理選取作業之後)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>時的資料列選取按一下按鈕時，但之後會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制處理選取的作業。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a status label with the currently selected row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如目前選取的資料列，更新狀態標籤時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event to display the name of the customer in the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件 以顯示客戶的名稱選取資料列內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料列的 [選取] 按鈕時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項處理選取作業之前)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>時的資料列選取按一下按鈕時，之前引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制處理選取的作業。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消選取作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the row selected by the user and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷使用者所選取的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消選取作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消選取作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event to cancel a select operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>取消選取作業的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data-key value for the persisted selected item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中持續選取的項目取得或設定資料索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The data key for the persisted selected item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中持續選取之項目的資料索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that no item is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see langword="null" />，表示目前未選取項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the selected row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 物件的參考，其表示控制項中已選取的資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the selected row in the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示控制項中已選取的資料列。

trans-unit.source: When a row is selected in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents that row.
trans-unit.target: 中選取一個資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>屬性，以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件，表示該資料列。

trans-unit.source: This is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object at the index specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這是擷取相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>所指定索引處物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: This object can then be used to access the properties of the selected row.
trans-unit.target: 此物件可用來存取所選的資料列的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property to access the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>屬性來存取的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>物件，表示選取的資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中已選取資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中已選取資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制選取的資料列中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下列方法的其中一個以宣告方式設定屬性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 將屬性放在開頭標記中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<SelectedRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 巢狀`<SelectedRowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property to define a custom style for the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>屬性可定義選取之資料列中的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data key value of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中已選取資料列的資料索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The data key value of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中已選取資料列的資料索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set with a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性設為以逗號分隔清單的欄位名稱代表資料來源的主索引鍵<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項會自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件使用的值或值控制項中的每個資料列指定的欄位或欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件接著會加入至控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>屬性用來擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>特定資料列中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: However, if you just need to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您只需要擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件的目前選取的資料列，您可以直接使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>較快速的屬性。

trans-unit.source: As a further shortcut, you can directly determine the data key value of the first key field of the selected row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 為進一步的捷徑，您可以直接判斷選取的資料列的第一個索引鍵欄位的資料值使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>物件，並想要存取的索引鍵欄位以外的第一個欄位，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to determine the data key value of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>屬性來判斷選取的資料列中的資料值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Selects the row to edit in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 選取要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中編輯的資料列。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Puts a row in edit mode in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control by using the specified row index.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的資料列索引，將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料列設為編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row on the page to edit.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面上要編輯之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the page index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control by using the row index.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料列索引，設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the footer row is displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中顯示頁尾資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the footer row; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示頁尾資料列，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A> property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A>屬性來指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項會顯示頁尾資料列。

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的外觀，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A> property to display the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A>屬性來顯示頁尾資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the header row is displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中顯示標頭資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the header row; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示標頭資料列，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the header row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>屬性來指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項顯示的標頭資料列。

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制標頭資料列的外觀，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> property to display the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>屬性來顯示中的標頭資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the heading of a column in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is visible when the column has no data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項中的資料行未包含資料時，顯示資料行的標題。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the header is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要顯示標題則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The sort expression with which to sort the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 用來對 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項進行排序的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control based on the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定排序運算式和方向對 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項進行排序。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A> method to programmatically sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control using the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>方法來以程式設計的方式排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制使用指定的排序運算式和方向。

trans-unit.source: The sort expression specifies the column or columns with which to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序運算式會指定用來排序的資料行。

trans-unit.source: To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序多個資料行，建立包含以逗號分隔的欄位名稱清單的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: 排序方向會指出是否執行排序以遞增或遞減的順序。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常使用於您需要排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項從受控制，例如從不同的控制項在頁面上。

trans-unit.source: This method is also commonly used to programmatically set a default sort order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when it is first rendered.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也通常用來以程式設計方式設定的預設排序次序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制第一次呈現時。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> events.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法也會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A> method to programmatically sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control by multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>方法來以程式設計的方式排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制多個資料行。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source control, but the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> that is associated with the data source is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項繫結至資料來源控制項，但與資料來源關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> 是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort direction of the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得正在排序之資料行的排序方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="SortDirection.Ascending" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="SortDirection.Ascending" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A> property to determine whether the column being sorted is sorted in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A>屬性來判斷是否要排序的資料行以遞增或遞減順序排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in sorting feature that automatically sets this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項具有內建的排序功能會自動設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only when you need to programmatically determine the sort direction or when you are adding your own custom sorting functionality to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常是您以程式設計方式判斷排序方向，或當您要加入至您自己自訂的排序功能需要時才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A> property to programmatically determine the sort direction of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A>屬性來以程式設計方式判斷的排序方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下排序資料行的超連結時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項處理排序作業之後)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>時按的超連結以排序資料行，但之後會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責排序作業。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as custom sorting, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供此事件發生時執行自訂的常式，如自訂排序的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> event to display the name of the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>事件，以顯示要排序的資料行的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS style for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> column when the column is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以遞增順序排序 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 資料行時，資料行的 CSS 樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a style is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control when the column is sorted in ascending order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以遞增順序排序資料行時，有樣式套用至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a style is applied to cells in the column when the data is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，當資料以遞增順序排序樣式套用至資料行中的資料格。

trans-unit.source: For example, the column can be highlighted with a specific color when the sort type is ascending.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，資料行可以是以反白顯示為特定色彩時以遞增順序排序類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS style to apply to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> column heading when the column is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以遞增順序排序 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 資料行時，要套用至資料行標題的 CSS 樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a style is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> heading when the column is sorted in ascending order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以遞增順序排序資料行時，有樣式套用至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 標題，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, an arrow that indicates the sort direction is displayed in the column heading.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，表示排序方向的箭頭會顯示在資料行標題中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> column when the column is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以遞減順序排序 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 資料行時，資料行的樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a style is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> when the column is sorted in descending order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以遞減順序排序資料行時，有樣式套用至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a style is applied to cells in the column when the data is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，當資料以遞減順序排序樣式套用至資料行中的資料格。

trans-unit.source: For example, the column can be highlighted with a specific color when the sort type is descending.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，資料行可以是以反白顯示為特定色彩會遞減排序類型時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to apply to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> column heading when the column is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以遞減順序排序 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 資料行時，要套用至資料行標題的樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a style is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> heading when the column is sorted in descending order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以遞減順序排序資料行時，有樣式套用至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 標題，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, an arrow that indicates the sort direction is displayed in the column heading.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，表示排序方向的箭頭會顯示在資料行標題中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得與正在排序之資料行關聯的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: The sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 與正在排序之資料行關聯的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A> property to determine the sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A>屬性來判斷資料行或排序的資料行相關聯的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in sorting feature that automatically sets this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項具有內建的排序功能會自動設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only when you need to programmatically determine the column or columns being sorted or when you are adding your own custom sorting functionality to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常是只有當您需要以程式設計方式判斷會排序資料行的資料行時，或當您要加入您自己自訂的排序功能來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When multiple columns are sorted, this property contains a comma-separated list of the fields by which to sort.
trans-unit.target: 多個資料行排序時，此屬性會包含以逗號分隔清單的排序所依據的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A> property to determine the name of the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A>屬性來判斷要排序的資料行的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下排序資料行的超連結時發生 (但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項處理排序作業之前)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>時按一下的超連結以排序資料行，但之前引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責排序作業。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the sorting operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消排序作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the sort expression for the column and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您決定資料行的排序運算式，並指出應該取消選取作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消選取作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically initiate a sort operation, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何以程式設計方式起始排序作業的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> event to perform the sorting functionality when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>事件來執行排序功能時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項繫結至<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> event to cancel a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>事件，以取消排序作業。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回以控制項為目標之回呼事件的結果。

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回呼的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>介面並使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>以非同步方式擷取資料和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A>方法來擷取的資料傳回至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至事件處理常式的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 方法中回呼處理常式的引數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> 是 helper 方法，以供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來建立在回呼處理常式的引數<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料值，這些值會在 ASP.NET 產生 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值時，用來識別資料繫結控制項的每個唯一的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 資料值，這些值會在 ASP.NET 產生 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值時，用來識別資料繫結控制項的每個唯一的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The event argument from which to create a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: 從其建立所引發事件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> 的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Raises the appropriate events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 回傳至伺服器時引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控制項的適當事件。

trans-unit.source: The page calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method when a postback event occurs to raise the appropriate events for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法時引發的適當事件就會發生回傳事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫發生在頁面生命週期中載入和變更的通知完成後，但尚未發生之前。

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use this property to set the specific data table, collection, or other data for the control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源包含多個資料來源，使用這個屬性來設定特定的資料表、 集合或其他資料，以繫結至控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> instance that contains multiple tables, you can specify which table to bind the control to by using this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果資料來源是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>執行個體，其中包含多個資料表，您可以指定要將控制項繫結使用此屬性的資料表。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 動態資料支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source object from which the data-bound control retrieves the list of data items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料繫結控制項從中擷取其資料項目清單的資料來源物件。

trans-unit.source: The data source object that the data-bound control uses.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項使用的資料來源物件。

trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 動態資料支援這個屬性。
